SDG[0].comment: X-Road provides affordable access to its services to developing countries with no license fee

SDG[1].comment: The first project companies will start working on in the process is a global "yellow vaccination card" which enables reliable and transparent cross-border exchange of vaccination data and steps are being taken to introduce X-Road on a global basis.

SDG[2].comment: X-Road plans to create Estfeed- the solution for data access and exchange on smart grid platform. This will allow access to electricity and gas smart meter data in Estonia powered by X-Road technology.

SDG[3].comment:
One of the main tasks of the TOOP project is to ensure the take-up of TOOP results and achieve their long-term sustainability. The members of TOOP set during the final phase of the project a special focus on these sustainability aspects.
In Estonia, X-Road saved 1,134 working years during the previous calendar year.

SDG[7].comment: The log records of each message sent between X-Road ecosystem member organizations provides evidence of a transaction thus building trust towards institutions.

clearOwnership.comment: The link points to github repository that contains X-Road development model description, development practices and guidelines.

documentation.comment: This link contains all the information about X-Road, source codes, documentation, how-to and troubleshooting articles, online training, service desk and chat.
